p: The bio-guided successive fractionation steps are illustrated in the different chromatograms shown below ( Figure 2, Figure 3 and Figure 4). In each chromatogram, the peak that was selected after each fractionation and biological activities evaluation ( Table 2, Table 3 and Table 4) has been pointed out. In the first, fraction F10 was selected ( Figure 2) because of its biological activities ( Table 2); in the second one, F10.3 was selected because of its biological activities ( Table 3) ( Figure 3). The identification work took place on peak F10.3.3 ( Figure 4), and its biological activities can be found in Table 4, obtained after the third fractionation/purification step.
